pages.text:
.entry-header
PALM VALLEY GOLF CLUB
No tee times necessary!
Experience the timeless charm of Palm Valley Golf Club, a meticulously crafted haven for golf enthusiasts. A charming establishment designed and built in 1989 by the visionary duo, Jack and Sue Hord, and still proudly owned and operated by the Hord family. Nestled in the heart of Nocatee, surrounded by acres of picturesque horse farms, our family-friendly facility invites golf enthusiasts of all ages and skill levels.
Discover our executive 9-hole golf course, an ideal destination for all, providing a serene and beautifully landscaped setting. Or practice your skills at our lush grass driving range tee and sprawling 8,000-square-foot putting green, open seven days a week. You can even experience the ultimate in golf technology at Toptracer Range, where covered hitting bays equipped with lights until 10pm await. Rent a Toptracer bay by the hour and indulge in unlimited balls as you engage with cutting-edge golf technology and games.
Whether you’re a novice looking to develop your skills or an accomplished golfer seeking a delightful challenge, Palm Valley Golf and Practice Range has something for everyone. Our prices are designed to be family-friendly, ensuring that everyone can enjoy the pleasures of the game.
Our family-friendly atmosphere makes us an ideal destination for all ages and experience levels. Embark on a golfing journey like never before at Palm Valley Golf Club – where tradition meets innovation, and every swing is a moment to savor.
1075 Palm Valley Road
(near Nocatee)
904.824.9279
.entry-content
#post-##

.entry-content

.entry-header
2 Hours of Outdoor Party Fun for $250
–
Ages 4 to Adult
10 Guests plus Birthday Boy or Girl is FREE
Gift for Birthday Boy or Girl
Fresh Hot Pizza from Papa Johns
Dedicated Party Host to handle your party
Facility Rental, Picnic Tables, Banquet Tables
and
Extra Chairs
for spectators
(1) one Gatorade, Water or Soda per person
Party plates, napkins, forks and table coverings
Trash Cans and Removal
Instruction and Games with Golf Professional Kimberly Lawlor
Breakdown of Time
90 minutes =  Fun Putting Games and Driving Range Hitting
(60 Minutes for ages 4-6 year olds)
30 minutes =  Party Time – Pizza and Cake
You can Bring:  Cake, Party Favors, Decorations, Snacks, Extra Non-Alcoholic Drinks.
Party Price Without Pizza:  $225
Additional Beverages:  $1.00 per drink
Additional Pizza for Adults:  $2.00 per Adult
Additional Guests:  $15 each (up to 25 total)
Contact:  Kimberly Lawlor (904) 651-8585
*Note:
A non-refundable deposit of 25% is required when scheduling group/event dates. Birthday parties and special events must be booked at least 10 days in advance. Funds are required upon scheduling the party. All cancellations must be done 7 days from the party date. A deposit becomes non-refundable within 7 days of the event.
Inclement Weather:  Allow a 24-hour cancellation and rescheduling of party. If within 24 hours of the party, there would be a 15% rebooking fee.
.entry-content

2025 Palm Valley Upcoming Tournaments and Events
Superbowl Par 3 and 3 Club Event – Sunday, February 9th -12:30pm shotgun
Callaway Demo Day – Saturday, May 24th from 11:00am-3:00pm
Adult-Junior Tournament – Saturday, June 21st – 4:00pm shotgun
Halloween Skills Challenge – Sunday, October 26th – 4:00pm-7:00pm
Junior Club Championship – Saturday, November 8th – 3:00pm tee times
Jack Hord Memorial Club Championship – Saturday, December 6th – 8:30am shotgun
.entry-content

2 Hours of Party Fun for $325!
3 Toptracer Bays
–
Up to 12 players
($27 pp)
Additional Bays – (1-4pp) $45
Fresh Hot Pizza from Papa Johns
Dedicated Party Host to handle your party
(1) one drink ticket per person
Party plates, napkins, forks and table coverings
Trash Cans and Removal
Instruction with Golf Professional Kimberly Lawlor
Breakdown of Time
30 minutes =  Party Time – Pizza and Cake
30 minutes =  Instruction with Golf Pro Kimberly Lawlor
60 minutes = Hitting balls and playing Toptracer Games
Party Price Without Pizza:
$290
Additional Beverages:  $1.00 per drink
Additional Pizza for Adults:  $2.00 per Adult
Maximum 4 players per bay
Contact:  Kimberly Lawlor (904)651-8585
*Note:
A non refundable deposit of 25% is required when scheduling group/event dates. Birthday parties and special events must be booked at least 10 days in advance.  All cancellations must be done 7 days from the party date. A deposit becomes non-refundable within 7 days of the event.
No other discounts apply.
.entry-content
